messages.subject: 2 questions
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, firstly i am after literature- published workd, or websites- containing information on the life of Tokugawa Tsunayoshi (1680-1709). The fifth Tokugawa
messages.messageBody:
Hi,
firstly i am after literature- published workd, or websites- containing
information on the life of Tokugawa Tsunayoshi (1680-1709). The fifth
Tokugawa Shogun. I am especially concerned with the protection of dogs that
his mother inspired, as well as the Urban culture during, and preceeding,
the Genroku Era (as well as any other information on this area, of which i
am particularly ignorant). Lastly, i would like to look into the Shohei
academy, of which Tsunayoshi was apparently the patron. Although, again, i
have no idea how long he remained appointed to this position.
Secondly, and less specific;- Can anyone inform me as to whether ancient
Assyria would have contained modern Baghdad.

Any, and all help would be accepted with my full thanks
Miles R Dewey
